meta.title: BPM Tapper - Calculate Beats Per Minute
meta.description: Free online BPM Tapper. Tap any key or click to calculate the Beats Per Minute (BPM) of a song. Perfect for musicians, DJs, and producers.

title: BPM Tapper
description: Calculate Beats Per Minute (BPM) by tapping to the rhythm.
